message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Alice, $180 is a bit high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can only offer $100 at this time.
I understand that $180 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $140.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $140 is still too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $120, but that's my absolute maximum.
I appreciate your flexibility, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you at $130, but that's as low as I can go.
Alice, I'm still not quite there yet. I'm willing to pay $125. If we can't agree on this, I'm going to have to consider my other options.
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $135. I'm willing to meet you at $132, but that's as low as I can go.
